name: Xavier Williams
bio: Xavier’s soaring soprano has been central to Aria Amore’s signature sound. Trained at the Conservatorio, she blends classical technique with heartfelt expression — ideal for the intimate emotions of weddings.
modalBio: Xavier Williams is a celebrated soprano known for her luminous tone and emotional depth. Trained at the Conservatorio, she blends classical technique with heartfelt expression — ideal for the intimate emotions of wedding ceremonies and recitals.

name: Latoya
bio: Latoya's warm alto tone brings emotional depth to both sacred and contemporary repertoire, captivating audiences with effortless grace and poise.
modalBio: Latoya is an accomplished alto whose warm tone and versatility captivate audiences worldwide. Her performances bridge genres, blending traditional hymns with soulful modern interpretations.

name: Collin Vasquez
bio: Collin’s resonant baritone lends dramatic presence to every performance, bringing timeless classics to life with sincerity and power.
